name: International Conference on Emerging Trends In Environmental Engineering and Pollution Control 2017
content: The ICETEEPC 2017\. International Conference on Emerging Trends In Environmental Engineering and Pollution Control will be held during Mar.13 â€“ Mar.15,2017 in China , aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Environmental Engineering and Pollution Control. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Environmental Engineering and Pollution Control.
